pkgmetadata.longdescription: Kinetic Evaluation of Chemical Degradation Data // Calculation routines based on the FOCUS Kinetics Report (2006, 2014). Includes a function for conveniently defining differential equation models, model solution based on eigenvalues if possible or using numerical solvers. If a C compiler (on windows: 'Rtools') is installed, differential equation models are solved using automatically generated C functions. Please note that no warranty is implied for correctness of results or fitness for a particular purpose.
